title: Advanced English Writing Assessment e-Portfolio Design for Pre-Service Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Aims to improve pre-service teachers' ability to write scientific abstracts and academic English papers, with a mobile-enabled environment for real-time feedback and self-reflection

learning_goals: Ability to write academic English introductions/conclusions of over 500 words using specialized scientific terminology

Learners can systematically document the science paper drafting process in three stages (planning, first draft, revision) in an e-portfolio over one week and submit a final revised version reflecting at least two of the three feedbacks received from two peers.
Receive and submit revised versions based on peer/instructor feedback at least twice weekly via mobile platforms

resources: Science Field English Research Paper Samples

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
